      • OdometryGlobalCoordinatePosition

        public OdometryGlobalCoordinatePosition​(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor verticalEncoderLeft,
                                        com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor verticalEncoderRight,
                                        com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor horizontalEncoder,
                                        double COUNTS_PER_INCH,
                                        int threadSleepDelayMs)
        Constructor for GlobalCoordinatePosition Thread
        Parameters:
        verticalEncoderLeft - left odometry encoder, facing the vertical direction
        verticalEncoderRight - right odometry encoder, facing the vertical direction
        horizontalEncoder - horizontal odometry encoder, perpendicular to the other two odometry encoder wheels
        threadSleepDelayMs - delay in milliseconds for the GlobalPositionUpdate thread (50-75 milliseconds is suggested)
